google.author: Heather C.
google.review: A wonderful mom and pop shop that serves huge, delicious portions of fabulous home recipes. The family that runs it are very sweet people.

yelp.author: Ray C.
yelp.review: Wonderful Italian food. Everything is fresh And delicious. Greek salad with grilled chicken is superb. The owners are very friendly.

tripadvisor.author: Mary D.
tripadvisor.review: This sub shop is family owned and easy to get to. Parking is public or street. The subs are made to order and very tasty. It is small but personable.
